text: Nellie L. (foaled 1940 in Kentucky) was an American Thoroughbred racehorse bred and raced by Calumet Farm. She was sired by Blenheim and out of the mare Nellie Flag.Nelli L.'s pedigree Trained by Ben Jones, in 1943 Nellie L. won the Kentucky Oaks New York Times - May 9, 1943 and Acorn Stakes,New York Times - May 20, 1943 two of the most important races for her age group. ==References== Category:1940 racehorse births Category:Racehorses bred in Kentucky Category:Racehorses trained in the United States Category:Kentucky Oaks winners Category:Thoroughbred family 9-f
title: Nellie L.
